output.input_text:
CT Abdomen and PelvisAbdominal pain, rule out appendicitisFindings:
Liver: Normal in size and contour, with no focal lesions.
Gallbladder and Biliary Tree: No evidence of gallstones or biliary dilation.
Pancreas: Unremarkable, no masses or calcifications.
Spleen: Normal in size, without focal lesions.
Kidneys: Normal bilaterally; no hydronephrosis or stones noted.
Appendix: Normal caliber, no evidence of inflammation.
Bowel: No dilatation or obstruction.
Lymph Nodes: No enlarged abdominal or pelvic lymph nodes.
Bones: No lytic or sclerotic lesions.

Impression:
No evidence of acute appendicitis.
Normal CT of the abdomen and pelvis.
